summary.purpose: Provides four coloured forklift SVG icon generator functions (red, yellow, green, gray) conforming to the VehicleSvg signature for use as map markers and menu icons.
summary.problem_solved: Supplies the forklift vehicle type's state-specific icon variants so map and menu components can reflect real-time ignition and speed state visually.

internal.why_used: Imports the VehicleSvg function type used to type the exported icon functions.

exports.name: redForkliftIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a red forklift SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

exports.name: yellowForkliftIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a yellow forklift SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

exports.name: greenForkliftIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a green forklift SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

exports.name: grayForkliftIcon
exports.description_one_line: Returns a gray forklift SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

symbols.name: redForkliftIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a red forklift SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.name: viewBoxFor
params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

returns.description: Red forklift icon SVG element. Red indicates ignition is off.

details.what_it_does: Generates a detailed forklift SVG icon in red, indicating the forklift's ignition is off.

minimal_correct.title: Render a red forklift icon
minimal_correct.code:
import { redForkliftIcon } from 'akeyless-assets-commons';

const icon = redForkliftIcon('30', '30', '#FF0000', 'newIconCar', 'map_icon');

symbols.name: yellowForkliftIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a yellow forklift SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.name: viewBoxFor
params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

returns.description: Yellow forklift icon SVG element. Yellow indicates idling.

details.what_it_does: Generates a detailed forklift SVG icon in yellow, indicating the forklift is idle.

minimal_correct.title: Render a yellow forklift icon
minimal_correct.code:
import { yellowForkliftIcon } from 'akeyless-assets-commons';

const icon = yellowForkliftIcon('30', '30', '#FFFF00', 'newIconCar', 'map_icon');

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

const icon = greenForkliftIcon('30', '30', '#00FF00', 'newIconCar', 'map_icon');

symbols.name: grayForkliftIcon
symbols.description_one_line: Returns a gray forklift SVG element with configurable size, site colour, CSS class, and viewBox context.

params.name: width
params.description: Width attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: height
params.description: Height attribute for the SVG element.

params.name: siteColor
params.description: Fill colour for site-specific colour accents.

params.name: className
params.description: CSS class name applied to the SVG element.

params.description: Context identifier ('map_icon' or 'menu_icon').

returns.description: Gray forklift icon SVG element. Gray indicates unknown telemetry state.
